item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：央行独立带来好结果
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二在国会小组会议上发表评论时表示，中央银行的独立性是实现美国经济最佳成果的一种行之有效且得到广泛支持的方式。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said central bank independence is a proven and well-supported way to achieve the best possible outcomes for the U.S. economy, in comments before a congressional panel on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报纸称咨询公司推荐淡水河谷 15 名首席执行官候选人
item.description: 据当地报纸《O Globo》周二报道，淡水河谷聘请的一家咨询公司已向这家巴西矿业公司的董事会推荐了 15 名潜在候选人，以帮助其开展首席执行官继任工作。【原文：A consulting firm hired by Vale to help it with its CEO succession process has presented the Brazilian miner's board of directors with 15 potential candidates, local newspaper O Globo reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 利雅得航空与达美航空合作发展网络
item.description: 利雅得航空公司（Riyadh Air）周二表示，该公司已与美国达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）建立了合作伙伴关系，这家沙特新成立的航空公司将在明年投入商业运营之前扩大其潜在网络。【原文：Riyadh Air said on Tuesday it has partnered with U.S. carrier Delta Air Lines as the Saudi startup carrier grows its potential network ahead of launching commercial operations next year.】

item.title: 印度希望与俄罗斯石油公司及其他俄罗斯公司达成能源交易
item.description: 印度外交大臣维纳伊-莫汉-夸特拉（Vinay Mohan Kwatra）周二表示，印度希望加强与俄罗斯的能源关系，并可能寻求与俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）和其他主要俄罗斯石油公司达成交易，作为促进双边贸易的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：India wants to strengthen its energy ties with Russia and could seek deals with Rosneft and other leading Russian oil firms as part of a broader push to boost bilateral trade, Foreign Secretary Vinay Mohan Kwatra said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 第五季保险公司因虚假银行账户和汽车收回被美国联邦储蓄委员会罚款
item.description: 美国第五第三银行公司（Fifth Third Bancorp）将支付 2,000 万美元的民事罚款，并向 35,000 名受害消费者提供补偿，以平息美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）对其开设未经授权账户和非法收回消费者汽车的指控。【原文：Fifth Third Bancorp will pay $20 million in civil fines and offer redress to 35,000 harmed consumers to settle U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau charges it opened unauthorized accounts and illegally repossessed their cars.】

item.title: 高盛资产经理认为美国经济和股市正在放缓
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）高管周二表示，预计 2024 年下半年美国经济增速将放缓至 2% 左右，受盈利增长下滑和政治忧虑影响，股票指数将基本持平。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management executives expect the U.S. economy to grow at a slower clip of about 2% in the second half of 2024, they said on Tuesday, with equity indexes seen largely flat due to declining earnings growth and political anxieties.】

item.title: 美国监管机构将就虚假账户和汽车保险对第五第三保险公司罚款 2000 万美元
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护最高监管机构周二表示，将对俄亥俄州贷款机构第五第三银行罚款 2000 万美元，原因是该机构涉嫌开设虚假客户账户，并强迫已投保的消费者购买汽车保险等。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog for consumer financial protection said Tuesday it would fine Ohio lender Fifth Third Bank $20 million for allegedly opening fake customer accounts and forcing auto insurance on consumers who already had coverage, among other allegations.】

item.title: 鲍威尔银行监管机构应重新提出巴塞尔计划
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二表示，美联储董事会 "强烈认为"，银行监管机构应就提高银行资本这一备受争议的努力寻求更多反馈，此举一直受到业界的关注。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Tuesday that is the "strongly held" view of the Fed board that bank regulators should seek additional feedback on a contentious effort to hike bank capital, a move that had been sought by the industry.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会称，全球黄金 ETF 在 6 月份迎来第二个流入月
item.description: 世界黄金协会（WGC）周二表示，由于在欧洲和亚洲上市的基金增持了黄金，全球实物黄金交易所交易基金（ETF）在6月份出现了连续第二个月的资金流入。【原文：Global physically backed gold exchange traded funds (ETFs) saw the second consecutive month of inflows in June due to additions to holdings by Europe- and Asia-listed funds, the World Gold Council (WGC) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司 6 月交付量同比下降 27
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司 6 月份交付的商用喷气式飞机数量超过了今年任何其他月份，但在法律和生产挑战旋风的影响下，44 架飞机的交付量同比下降了 27%。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered more commercial jets in June than in any other month this year, but the total of 44 planes represented a 27% drop on an annual basis amid a whirlwind of legal and production challenges.】

item.title: Shein 承诺在潜在 IPO 之前投资英国和欧洲
item.description: 快速时尚零售商Shein表示，它将在五年内在英国和欧洲投资2.5亿欧元（2.71亿美元），因为该公司的模式是将廉价服装和配饰从中国的工厂直接空运到全球各地的购物者手中，它正在与对这一模式的批评作斗争。【原文：Fast fashion retailer Shein said it would invest 250 million euros ($271 million) over five years in the UK and Europe as the company battles criticism of its model based around flying cheap clothes and accessories from factories in China direct to shoppers worldwide.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长耶伦：中国人工智能投资限制目标狭窄
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二在美国众议院金融服务小组会议上对议员们表示，美国针对中国人工智能领域的某些投资是严格针对明确的国家安全风险的。【原文：U.S. targeting of certain investments in artificial intelligence in China is narrowly targeted at clear national security risks, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen told lawmakers on the U.S. House panel on financial services on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔："更多良好数据 "将 "加强 "降息理由
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周二在国会作证时表示，通胀率 "仍高于 "美国联邦储备委员会2%的目标，但近几个月来一直在改善，"更多的良好数据将加强 "央行降息的理由。【原文：Inflation "remains above" the U.S. Federal Reserve's 2% target, but has been improving in recent months and "more good data would strengthen" the case for central bank interest rate cuts, Fed Chair Jerome Powell said on Tuesday in congressional testimony.】

item.title: 耐克陷入困境，阿迪达斯将从中受益
item.description: 阿迪达斯低帮多色运动鞋 Samba 和 Gazelle 的成功，以及竞争对手耐克销售的疲软，将帮助这家德国运动品牌实现强劲的第二季度销售业绩和三年来最大的利润率。【原文：The success of Adidas' low-rise multi-coloured Samba and Gazelle sneakers, along with weaker sales at rival Nike, should help the German sportswear brand deliver strong second-quarter sales and its biggest profit margin in three years.】

item.title: 低价、拖欠工资迫使加纳可可种植者转向走私者
item.description: 可可种植者和官员告诉路透社，低廉的价格和付款拖延正迫使加纳的可可种植者将可可卖给日益复杂的走私团伙，从边境地区抽走可可产量，并使人们对下一季的产量产生怀疑。【原文：Low prices and payment delays are pushing Ghana's cocoa farmers to sell to increasingly sophisticated smuggling rings, siphoning off production from border areas and raising doubt over next season's output, growers and officials told Reuters.】

item.title: Meta 扩展仇恨言论政策，删除更多针对 "犹太复国主义者 "的帖子
item.description: Meta Platforms 周二表示，它将开始删除更多针对 "犹太复国主义者 "的帖子，因为 "犹太复国主义者 "一词是指犹太人和以色列人，而不是代表政治运动的支持者。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Tuesday it would start taking down more posts that target "Zionists", where the term is used to refer to Jewish people and Israelis rather than representing supporters of the political movement.】

item.title: 莫迪访问莫斯科，俄罗斯与印度洽谈业务
item.description: 俄罗斯和印度领导人周二在莫斯科举行会晤，双方同意加强从核能到造船等领域的合作，并讨论了如何解决支付问题。【原文：Russia and India agreed to increase cooperation in sectors ranging from nuclear power to shipbuilding and discussed how to fix payments problems as their leaders met in Moscow on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街分析师看好基因检测公司 Tempus AI
item.description: 华尔街券商周二开始看涨软银集团支持的Tempus AI公司，认为该公司的人工智能临床和分子数据图书馆可能带来更强大的诊断和测试工具。【原文：Wall Street brokerages started covering SoftBank Group-backed Tempus AI on a bullish note on Tuesday, betting that the company's AI-powered library of clinical and molecular data could lead to more powerful diagnostic and test kits.】

item.title: 富国银行聘用亚历山德拉-巴特负责杠杆融资部门
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周二表示，已任命亚历山德拉-巴特（Alexandra Barth）为其杠杆融资业务的联席主管，在该行寻求扩大投资银行业务的同时，加强了该行的队伍。【原文：Wells Fargo said on Tuesday it has named Alexandra Barth as the co-head of its leveraged finance business, beefing up the lender's ranks as it looks to expand its investment banking operations.】

item.title: 指证班克曼-弗里德的前 FTX 高管将被判刑
item.description: 周二的法庭记录显示，破产的加密货币交易所 FTX 的两名前高管已经安排了量刑听证会，他们指证了创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）。【原文：Sentencing hearings have been scheduled for two former executives of bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX who testified against founder Sam Bankman-Fried, court records showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说员：美国药房福利管理公司为何受到抨击？
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二在一份关于药房福利管理公司调查的中期报告中说，医疗保健行业的整合使这些公司对处方药价格的影响力过大，因此有必要对其进行监管。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Tuesday in an interim report on its investigation into pharmacy benefit managers that healthcare consolidation has given the companies outsized influence over prescription drug prices that could warrant regulation.】

item.title: 贝莱德最青睐日本股市
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BII）周二表示，日本股票是其最青睐的股票投资品种，而利率长期走高的前景使得与通胀挂钩的债券在战略前景上具有吸引力。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute (BII) said on Tuesday that Japan stocks were its favoured equity investment play, while the prospect of higher-for-longer interest rates made inflation-linked bonds attractive on a strategic horizon.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，市场整合导致中间商对美国药品价格影响过大
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二表示，药房和医疗保险公司通过多年的交易进行整合，导致少数药房福利管理公司对处方药价格施加了过大的影响。【原文：The consolidation of pharmacies and health insurance companies through years of deal making has led to a handful of pharmacy benefit managers exercising outsized influence over prescription drug prices, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沙特阿美出售美元债券重返债市
item.description: 沙特国有石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）在中断三年后于周二重返债务市场，加入了海湾地区顶级公司和政府今年利用市场为投资融资的行列。【原文：Saudi state oil giant Aramco made its return to the debt market on Tuesday after a three-year hiatus, joining top companies and governments in the Gulf that have tapped markets this year to fund investments.】

item.title: 穆迪警告：法国大选结果对信用评级 "不利
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）警告说，法国议会选举的结果对该国的信用评级是负面的，因为大联合将使决策和控制债务的任务变得更加困难。【原文：The outcome of France's parliamentary election is negative for the country's credit rating, Moody's has warned, as a grand coalition would make decision-making and the task of bringing its debt under control more difficult.】

item.title: 调查显示，中国在采用生成式人工智能方面领先全球
item.description: 一项新的调查显示，中国在采用生成式人工智能方面走在世界前列，这是中国在这项技术上取得长足进步的最新迹象，这项技术在美国 OpenAI 公司的 ChatGPT 于 2022 年末推出后赢得了全球关注。【原文：China is leading the world in adopting generative AI, a new survey shows, the latest sign the country is making strides in the technology that gained global attention after U.S.-based OpenAI's ChatGPT launched in late 2022.】

item.title: 消息人士称英美资源集团为煤炭资产出售聘请银行
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士周二称，英美资源集团已聘请三家银行出售其炼钢煤炭资产，分析师认为该资产价值高达50亿美元，是为抵御竞争对手必和必拓（BHP）的收购而进行的更广泛重组的一部分。【原文：Anglo American has hired three banks for the sale of its steelmaking coal assets, which analysts value at as much as $5 billion and is part of a broader restructuring to fend off an approach from rival BHP , two sources close to the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球监管机构收紧银行外包服务规则
item.description: 全球银行监管机构巴塞尔委员会周二建议，银行董事会董事必须对外包服务承担最终责任，并记录他们如何管理客户服务中断的风险。【原文：Board directors of banks must take ultimate responsibility for outsourced services and document how they manage the risk of outages and disruptions to customer services, the global Basel Committee of banking regulators proposed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞公司长期科学主管 Mikael Dolsten 将卸任
item.description: 辉瑞公司周二表示，该公司首席科学官 Mikael Dolsten 将卸任，他是该公司开发 COVID-19 疫苗的关键人物，在该制药公司工作了 15 年多。【原文：Pfizer said on Tuesday its chief scientific officer Mikael Dolsten, a key figure behind the development of the company's COVID-19 vaccine, would step down after a more than 15-year career at the drugmaker.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称诺镍公司正与中国铜业商谈将冶炼厂迁往中国事宜
item.description: 四位知情人士告诉路透社，诺尔尼克公司正在与中国铜业公司洽谈组建合资企业事宜，这将使这家俄罗斯矿业巨头能够将其整个铜冶炼基地迁往中国。【原文：Nornickel is in talks with China Copper to form a joint venture that would allow the Russian mining giant to move its entire copper smelting base to China, four sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】
